attributes.review: This app literally made me almost burn my house down!! It all started with when I downloaded it!!! It took DAYS to download and when it did, the smell of Cheeto puffs filled my nostrils!! Apparently flying squirrels HATE this smell and came flying through my window!!! At the time, my phone was lying on the stove, and the squirrels turned on the stove, trying to burn my phone!!! I quickly grabbed one of my room mates super hero capes and tried to put the fire out!! The cape because magic from the smoke and I suddenly started to fly around my house wearing that burning cape!!! Thankfully my hermit crab was home and helped me to put the fire out! My fingers are BURNING from typing out this review right now!! Who knew burnt phone screens stay super hot for a long while. I have to head to the ER, my fingertips just fell off. So PLEASE, if our value your life, DON’T even THINK about downloading this app.
attributes.title: Almost burnt my house down!!!

attributes.review: I love trump but this app is not the way to go so I think we should take it down and I was trying to download this app and all of a sudden it said on my front wall like when I was trying to purchase the app it said that I was fat and I was ugly and I didn’t belong here and I was Mexican so I couldn’t download this app but I obviously love trump so I did it again andI just feel like I was body shamed does this happen to anybody else I need to know this is ruining my life and I miss kill myself yesterday because I was called fat by this app so I am giving it a one star rating like I do to orange people let me dedicate it I just feel like I was body shamed does this happen to anybody else I need to know this is ruining my life and I am with Kim myself yesterday because I was called a fat by this up so I’m giving it a one star rating like I do to orange people let me dedicate Sebastian bills as an example.
attributes.title: No more😭

attributes.review: I downloaded the app and just got a screen of a screaming orange! It was terrible and scary😖 I just wanted to see what the old people were talking about I thought this was a trend because all the boomers were talking about it, it’s terrible 😭 I had my AirPods on and I had the volume really low but he just kept screaming so loud and my ears started bleeding 😔 I am now deaf, thank u mr orange 🙄 but i took off my airpods and they got disconnected from my phone so then the screaming of the orange was louder and the volume got all the way up by itself 😭 my windows BROKE because it was so loud😡the glass hit my leg😢 I got a cut on my leg so now my ears were bleeding and so was my leg😔 IT HURT MR ORANGE DONT DO THAT AGAIN😠 just a warning for all of u to not get the app⚠️ boomers can’t hear that well so that’s y they say nothing’s wrong because they can’t hear the screaming but pls be careful it could also break your window and cut you😔
attributes.title: BAD APP!😡

attributes.review:
This app ✂️gave me a headache.🤬🤬 I thought this could be a nice way of supporting our orange god trump 🎃🎃but, I was sadly mistaken.😥😥😥 When opening the app it gave off almost a orangey spray tan 🧚‍♀️🧚‍♀️💜type smell. 🍊🍊And as you can imagine it smell awful.🤮🤮🤮🤢 The smell made me and my dog Martha pass out. 😵😵😵After we passed out and I woke up I was orange and had a wig on.🤤🤤🧖‍♀️🧖‍♀️my dog woke up and was a foreigner. 🐕🐕And I remember 🧡looking I’m the mirror and being very concerned 😖😖because obviously I would not like to look like trump. ❌❌❌Now its days later and I still look like him. 😳😳no matter what I do it won’t go away.😡😡😡 so I’d know please please give me recommendations on how to stop this.😭😭So I 5000% do not recommend🤮 getting this app.❤️unless you want to look like trump and have your dog Martha turn in to a grr🐯😖😡four in her💕four in her💕. 
                                       -much love , tangy oranger
attributes.title: Absolutely awful

attributes.review:
i downloaded this app to see how bad mr. trumpet was and i only got more reasons to hate him. i got so excited feeding my hatred towards him that i started levitating. when i was going back down to the floor i landed on my foot wrong, so i had to go to the ER. when i got to the ER they were telling me i had an ED (not eating disorder). I came home to Gordon Ramsey in the kitchen, and he was making a grilled cheese sandwich (i’m vegan btw). Then, HE FED IT TO ME. After that I went to sleep, and dreamt about kissing Harry Styles. Then, I peed myself and my mom kicked me out of our house. So now I don’t have a toilet anymore. HOW SADDD. Oh, and i’m homeless. Then I decided to hitchhike to the white house. After many days of walking, my feet gave up
on me and I lost my ability to walk. HOW CRAZY. Now I’m sitting next to a frog waiting to be rescued by my one true love, Harry Styles. This is why you shouldn’t get this app.
attributes.title: have 🤔you😒ever😔been😡snaked🐍by🙃a🤨 friend

attributes.review:
I got the app and it was the WORST decision ever it was so disgusting it even made my phone throw up right when I opened the app A Cheeto puff popped up on my phone I was  scarred for life then it asked for my email and I was like MIND YOUR DAM BUSINESS DAVID 
but It kept asking then the same Cheeto jumped out of my phone beat my abuela to death (rip abuela you will me missed🙏🏽) then kicked my Chihuahua (now he has a broken rib and leg🥺) then proceeds to decapitate my sister ( you will be missed baby ily💜) then slits my dads throat (he’s now in critical condition😭) he then rips  my moms eyeball out(she’s blind in her right eye now😫) then he proceeded to ask me if I wanted to vote for him I am now traumatize and have to go to therapy please do not get this app I just want my family back😢😭 also don’t vote for a rapist ,sexist ,child rapist, a racist and many more bad things about that Cheeto but overall it’s a one star bc I got bad vibes💅🧚✨
attributes.title: I just go bad vibes💅

attributes.review:

I opened the app and was immediately greeted with and our orange 🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊 and a peach 🍑🍑🍑🍑🍑🍑🍑🍑 jumping out at me through the screen! They were saying it’s not bad it’s just ✨r a p e ✨ and just grab them by the püssy!!!! attributes.title: PEACHES WAS ON THIS APP

attributes.review: this app stinks!!!! i downloaded it to keep up with big daddy trump so i can see how his election is going but when i opened it, it didn’t even request my location, IT STOLE IT. then it started recommending tanning salons and hair dye. it mentioned being a part of the “Trumpies” cult!!! as a white middle age christian woman i don’t think that being a part of a political cult is the way to heaven! since i didn’t go to the tanning salon and didn’t dye my hair, people came to my HOUSE. WHERE MY KIDS ARE. we were sprayed with orange paint and given “MAGA” hats. they were so forceful and my kids keep having nightmares! they even billed us for the “spray tan” they gave us! the app told me that my family could no longer eat shrimp anymore due to our president’s “special shrimp” that was leaked. i am deleting this app and never downloading it again!!! i am still orange and traumatized from this app! DONT DOWNLOAD IT!!!!
attributes.title: what in tarnation😡😡😡

attributes.review: Hello, I’m a 23 year old woman with republican parents. Yes that is right, I have the right to vote. Well we were right side. We believed alm and not all cops are bad. We noticed trump had an app and downloaded it very quickly. When I opened it it asked for my number, so I put it in thinking I’d get reminders for rallies and news. Once I put my number in I kept getting texts saying “vote sleepy joe out trump 2020” non stop for a whole day. I thought it was weird but then the next day came around. When I opened the app there was a picture of Donald trump being spray tanned... nude... I was disgusted, I told my parent and they looked at me shocked and in denial. I showed them and my mother passed out hitting her head on the ground! So I came to write a review for the app noticing everyone else has been having very unspeakable problems with the app too. Now me and my family are VERY left sided and btw blm acab❤️.
attributes.title: Unbelievable

attributes.review:
